website_summaries.verdict: Amino acid chelate form of selenium.
pros: Solid positive reviews for effectiveness and quality
Comes with a one-year money back guarantee
cons: May cause stomach upset if taken in excess
Suggested dosage may be too high for some

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: These are working good so far, have noticed a drop in weight without any side effects, and life seems to be a little more plesent now. Haven't gained any weight back and keep feeling better everyday. Also have noticed a slight increase in memory. Happy to have been turned on to this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Solley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Suggested three times a day usage may be an overdose and unecessary.
customer_reviews.author: Williy

customer_reviews.title: Feeling better already
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can get my hypothyroid in balance, and feel better at the same time. I was surprised that this did both!
customer_reviews.author: GracefulGhost

customer_reviews.title: So Much Better
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to take Selenium because I've dealt with hypothyroidism for years and was recently diagnosed w/Hashimoto's. My doctor was unsympathetic to my complaints of low energy, weight gain, other symptoms because my TSH was in the normal range. I have been taking one 200mcg capsule for 11 days now. I notice no odor as some others have mentioned. It sounds like this is a problem with tablets but not capsules? Almost immediately, my appetite was less and I had more energy. I've lost 6 lbs. with no real effort. I feel like a normal person again.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Chick

customer_reviews.title: FAR SUPERIOR!
customer_reviews.text: I have taken other brands of selenium in tablet form and found them very difficult to swallow. These capsules are far superior and much easier to take. Just what I was hoping for. Order came very promptly. Will definitely order this brand again. It's also soy, gluten and dairy free which is important to me in selecting a supplement.
customer_reviews.author: nightingale RN

customer_reviews.title: Effective supplement and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great in combating thyroid problems and Hashimotos. Recommend this product. Nice customer service. They made sure this product was gluten free for me.
customer_reviews.author: GHills

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a great quality supplement very nice bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality selenium supplement. I will always buy this brand great price. And very effective make sure you use this together with iodine. This is a must have supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin ramdhan

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!!
customer_reviews.text: Good product! It should be noted that, like all supplements, it should be consumed in a balanced manner and without exaggeration.
customer_reviews.author: Lourenco B. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Find your Inner Strength Again
customer_reviews.text: Nice, I have been using this supplement for about a week and I have more energy, sleep better and feel better. Don't overdo the intake and you should feel better. I am a female in postmenopausal phase of life and fatigue comes with the program. Adding Selenium has helped me feel more normal. Mowing and working seems to be easier. I am breathing better and not fatigued. Talk to your doctor or dietitian.
customer_reviews.author: V Utx

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing whatsoever.
customer_reviews.text: I initially liked this product because, in comparison to the tablets I had been taking, it has no smell whatsoever and no aftertaste. If you've taken other selenium supplements, you know the horrible smell that comes with them. However, it seems that along with no smell or aftertaste, there appears to be no actual selenium in these capsules. While I noticed impressive results from the stinky tablets I had been taking, I saw absolutely no results from these capsules whatsoever. None. Zero. Zip. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Bad GI problems
customer_reviews.text: Gave me some GI problems. I know its TMI, but I want you to all know as well. I stick to fish for my selenium content now. Also, selenium supposedly blocks the absorption of mercury from larger fish into our bodies as well (think tuna).
customer_reviews.author: JustAGuy

customer_reviews.title: Hope it does what it should
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to take it bug the smell and after taste is just so strong....gak. Just hope it does whatever it should be doing , because that smell is horrifying.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Tidbitz

customer_reviews.title: FEELS GOOD !
customer_reviews.text: Took this with glutathione on an empty stomach and I felt this right away ...it makes you feel good .idk what that it is that makes you feel that way but that’s how I feel and my husband also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These give me so much energy is the mornings.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to help regulate my thyroid. I have so much energy in the mornings now. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something so simple that is so great!
customer_reviews.text: Addition of Selenium was recommended by my Naturopathic doctor along with a couple of other supplements. Overall, I am feeling better and attribute it to ALL of the additions to my daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Gould

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: This product gives me headaches and no energy. Just awful. Not a good value if you cant take it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Georges

customer_reviews.title: Small capsule is very easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.text: I've had thyroid issues for decades. I came across an article about selenium's interaction with thyroid replacement Rx's. I asked my endocrinologist about it and he simply said more research is ongoing but is commonly found in multivitamins so it's my choice. I decided to try it 2 years ago. I have no idea if it's having any positive effect but the capsule is easy to swallow and there's no odor.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Pigfish

customer_reviews.title: We need all the help we can get!
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be a good prevention solution for cancer. Don't know really for sure, but I do know you get a lot of pills for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement for Overall Health
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to boost my immune system and for the heart health benefits. So far I am pleased.

customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be working great. I take it to aid in the absorption of the Thyroid medication. Since taking it I have felt my Thyroid symptom lessen.

customer_reviews.title: These work

customer_reviews.title: Good value and NO smell !!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it works, but the price is better than most others I've compared it to. One thing worth noting is that these capsules have no bad smell to them. I ordered the tablets last time and the smell is horrible.. Stick with the capsules if you take this supplement !!

customer_reviews.title: I didn't notice much difference for me, but it worked for the pup.

How can I know this? The bump that they leave on my neck has gotten considerably smaller! Effective and worth the bi-monthly subscription!

customer_reviews.title: better than other selenium I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I actually lost a few pounds after taking this. Had gained weight with Hashimoto's hypothyroidism and while this didn't help me lose a ton of weight, I did lose about 5 pounds after taking it. That didn't happen with other brands of selenium I had tried. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Good ...no complain. It's also good for women after birth because we tend to deplete all our body enzymes and nutrients after birth. And weight gain is common due to lack of certain nutrients and gland functions. Thyroid issues are common with women after birth but we are mostly unaware about it while we gain weight. So this helps me not to gain any further weight. I have stopped adding weight and just maintained the same since i started taking this. I just need to exercise now along with selenium intake but been busy.

customer_reviews.title: Fake Selenium! Do Not Buy

customer_reviews.title: For your health
customer_reviews.text: With supplements, your trusting what the experts are telling you. During a battle with cancer and during 7 chemo, 35 radiation treatments a friend suggested, I researched and this is now a daily pill I take. No side effects, easy to take and I'm feeling like I used to. My Dr said taking it can't hurt, the upside I think why not? Blood work, CAT Scans every 3 months, along with a CoQ10 and my Centrem Silver,,, no Meds.

product_meta.title: Selenium 200 Mcg for Immune System, Thyroid, Prostate and Heart Health - Selenium Amino Acid Complex - Essential Trace Mineral with Superior Absorption, Non GMO, 250 Capsules
feature_bullets: IMMUNE SYSTEM, THYROID, HEART & METABOLISM SUPPORT - Selenium naturally supports immune system, healthy thyroid, prostate & heart function. Selenium may also play a key role in metabolism in both men and women.
ESSENTIAL MICRONUTRIENT SELENIUM AMINO ACID COMPLEX- Selenium is a natural micronutrient that may play a vital role in many essential body functions.
SUPERIOR QUALITY: Laboratory tested. All Bronson products are tested in our state-of-the-art cGMP registered facility in New York.

TRUSTED SINCE 1960: The pioneers of Bronson Vitamins were a group of pharmacists who witnessed the benefits of vitamins and mineral supplementation firsthand with their patients. Bronson Vitamins have been consistently mentioned by top medical professionals since our inception in 1960.
WORKS OR YOUR MONEY BACK: We back our products up with a 365-day hassle-free money back guarantee. There's no risk when you order now!
